Welcome. Please, let me quickly explain this app to you.\n\nLN Address to Invoice allows paying to email-like Lightning addresses from unsupported wallets. This utility is launched when you interact with addresses in your browser or other apps. Here\'s how it is done.
Sometimes, a Lightning address is a clickable link, just like an email. When you click it, LN Address to Invoice appears. In the following profile card, try clicking the address:

Often a Lightning address is just a text. In this case, select it and in the appeared system menu look for the Send sats action. In the following comment, try selecting the address and use the app action:
Setting up an address under your domain is easy, see LUD-16. For example, mine is %1$s and it\'s an Alby alias

If you see a Lightning address which is neither clickable nor selectable, or the presenting app doesn\'t support selection actions, just copy the address from there and paste into LN Address to Invoice with the Paste button in the header of this screen, or with the Paste address launcher icon shortcut.
